Name: Valkyrie
Card Description: Gain 2 glory per enemy figure destroyed in battle with this monster.

Name: Dark Elf
Card Description: This monster may invade Yggdrasil. *Has 3 STR in Yggdrasil

Name: Wolfman
Card Description: Only monsters count their STR in a battle with this monster.

Name: Lord of Axes
Card Description: If you successfully pillage with your leader, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Experts in Arms
Card Description: Your warriors are now 2 STR.

Name: Fire Dragons
Card Description: Gain 8 glory when a ship of yours is destroyed.

Name: Odin's Inspiration
Card Description: Double your glory award from dying during Ragnarok.

Name: Tyr's Challenge
Card Description: As your action, you may pay 2 rage to "repillage" an already pillaged province.

Name: Frigga's Protection
Card Description: You may pay 1 rage to prevent a figure of yours from being destroyed.

Name: Alfheim Quest
Card Description: Have the most STR in at least one Alfheim (gray) province. If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Jotunheim Quest
Card Description: Have the most STR in at least one Jotunheim (blue) province. If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Manheim Quest
Card Description: Have the most STR in at least one Manheim (yellow) province. If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Glorious Death
Card Description: Have at least 4 figures in Valhalla (before Ragnarok). If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Heimdall's Eye
Card Description: You may play this card (and add its STR) after all players' battle cards are revealed.

Name: Odin's Tide
Card Description: Before comparing STR, each player chooses and destroys all but one of his figures in this battle.

Name: Loki's Backstab
Card Description: If you lose, steal 2 glory from the winning player.

Name: Heimdall's Watch
Card Description: Discard all revealed cards. Gain glory equal to the total +STR revealed. Then play new cards.

Name: Heimdall's Eye
Card Description: You may play this card (and add its STR) after all players' battle cards are revealed.

Name: Thor's Oath
Card Description: If you win, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Fire Giant
Card Description: When this monster invades a province, destroy all enemy non-Monster figures in it.

Name: Loki's Eminence
Card Description: Gain 2 glory for each figure you release from Valhalla.

Name: Tyr's Prowess
Card Description: If you win a battle, you may keep any of your revealed cards, payign 1 rage each.

Name: Yggdrasil Quest
Card Description: Have the most STR in Yggdrasil. If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Card Description: You may play this card (and add its STR) after all players' battle cards are revealed.
